html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01662018-02-21,  CH,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MICHAEL A. GEIST of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective March 1, 2018, in the place of Jane Knott Hungerford, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MICHAEL A. GEIST of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective March 1, 2018, in the place of Jane Knott Hungerford, whose term has expired.
